Package dataset

Class DefaultDataset

java.lang.Object
dataset.DefaultDataset
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dataset, java.lang.Iterable<Instance>
public class DefaultDataset
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dataset
This class implements a Dataset in which the set of instances is represented by a List and the set of Attributes by an array
